info.name: JEP 455 - Primitive Types in Patterns, instanceof, and switch (Preview)
info.dscr: It is now possible to use primitive data types for pattern matching

info.name: JEP 457 - Class-File API (Preview)
info.dscr: Demo for JEP 457: Standard API for parsing, generating, and transforming Java class files; see ClassFileApiDemo.java

info.name: JEP 458 - Launch Multi-File Source-Code Programs
info.dscr: Demonstrates launching multi-file source-code programs directly with java; see LaunchMultiFileSourceDemo.java

info.name: JEP 462 - Structured Concurrency (Second Preview)
info.dscr: Simplifies multithreaded programming by managing tasks in a structured scope. Demonstrates using StructuredTaskScope to manage subtasks as a single unit of work.

info.name: JEP 463 - Implicitly Declared Classes and Instance Main Methods (Second Preview)
info.dscr: See ImplicitlyDeclaredClassesDemo class for further info

info.name: JEP 466 - Class-File API (Second Preview)
info.dscr: See ClassFileAPI class for further info

info.name: JEP 467 - Markdown Documentation Comments
info.dscr: Markdown is now allowed in Java comments. See MarkdownComments.java class for further info

info.name: JEP 469 - Vector API (Eighth Incubator)
info.dscr: See VectorAPI class for further info

info.name: JEP 471 - Deprecate the Memory-Access Methods in sun.misc.Unsafe for Removal
info.dscr: No executable code, see DeprecateMemoryAccessMethods class for further info

info.name: JEP 473 - Stream Gatherers (Second Preview)
info.dscr: See StreamGatherers class for further info

info.name: JEP 474 - ZGC: Generational Mode by Default
info.dscr: No executable code, see GenerationalZGC23.java for further info

info.name: JEP 476 - Module Import Declarations (Preview)
info.dscr: Java now allows 'import module <x>' statement to simplify import declarations

info.name: JEP 477 - Implicitly Declared Classes and Instance Main Methods (Third Preview)
info.dscr: See ImplicitlyDeclaredClasses class for further info

info.name: JEP 480 - Structured Concurrency (Third Preview)
info.dscr: See StructuredConcurrency class for further info

info.name: JEP 481 - Scoped Values (Third Preview)
info.dscr: Scoped Values enable a method to share immutable data both within a thread and in child threads

info.name: JEP 482 - Flexible Constructor Bodies (Second Preview)
info.dscr: Since Java 22, super() is no longer required to be placed as first statement in constructor

info.name: JEP 460 - Vector API (Seventh Incubator)
info.dscr: Demonstrates SIMD vector computations using the Vector API. See JEP460VectorApiDemo.java for code.
